issue.title: ABI checker has false positives in source compatibility

content.raw:
I saw that error too, but I also see similar complaints about gazebo7, which I traced to a bug in RandomVelocityPlugin.hh. I fixed it in https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/commits/ba7ac21ce0d3a314eb9465f45dc55e7214c05361 in branch `diagnostics_part1` and when comparing that branch to gazebo7 in [this job](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/408/console#console-section-2) it didn't complain about errors in header files for the fixed branch, but it still has source compatibility complaints.

To further prove this, I would compare `diagnostics_part1` to itself, which should have no header file errors but still have the source compatibility problems, but that would wipe out the workspace folder. I'll let you run that job if you would like the proof.

I saw that error too, but I also see similar complaints about gazebo7, which I traced to a bug in RandomVelocityPlugin.hh. I fixed it in https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/commits/ba7ac21ce0d3a314eb9465f45dc55e7214c05361 in branch diagnostics_part1 and when comparing that branch to gazebo7 in this job it didn't complain about errors in header files for the fixed branch, but it still has source compatibility complaints.

To further prove this, I would compare diagnostics_part1 to itself, which should have no header file errors but still have the source compatibility problems, but that would wipe out the workspace folder. I'll let you run that job if you would like the proof.
